meanings.definition: Excessive or offensive sexual desire or behavior.
meanings.sent1: His lechery made others uncomfortable at the party.
meanings.sent2: The movie depicted a character consumed by lechery.
meanings.sent3: The lechery of the dog towards the neighbor's cat was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The lechery of the politician for power was evident in his every move.
meanings.sent5: The lechery of the storm clouds foretold a night of heavy rain.

meanings.sent1: The lechery in his eyes was unmistakable.
meanings.sent2: She was known for her lechery among the townspeople.
meanings.sent3: The lechery of the squirrel stealing nuts was quite amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The lechery of the flames danced wildly in the fireplace.
meanings.sent5: The lechery of the wind whispered secrets through the trees.
